items.title: Sunday: Light Rain
items.description: High: 12°C, Low: 7°C. Light rain throughout the day. Winds: 10mph NE.

items.title: Monday: Cloudy
items.description: High: 10°C, Low: 6°C. Mostly cloudy with occasional sunshine. Winds: 8mph NW.

items.title: Tuesday: Clear
items.description: High: 14°C, Low: 8°C. Sunny all day with light winds. Winds: 5mph W.
